Name: Timer in Combat
Description: Executes actions on a timer in combat - expires based on initial and repeat inputs
Param1Tooltip: Minumum Time used to calculate Random Initial Expire
Param2Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Initial Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Timer out of Combat
Description: Executes actions on a timer out of combat - expires based on initial and repeat inputs
Param1Tooltip: Minumum Time used to calculate Random Initial Expire
Param2Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Initial Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: HP threshold
Description: Executes actions when within hp threshold and cooldown is off while in combat
Param1Tooltip: Maximum HP% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param2Tooltip: Minimum HP% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Mana threshold
Description: Executes actions when within mana threshold and cooldown is off while in combat
Param1Tooltip: Maximum Mana% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param2Tooltip: Minimum Mana% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: On Aggro
Description: Executes actions when creature enters combat

Name: On Kill
Description: Executes actions when a unit is killed
Param1Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param2Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param3Tooltip: If set to 1, event only goes off on player kill

Name: On Death
Description: Executes actions on AI creature death
Param1Tooltip: ConditionId from conditions table - only fires when condition is met

Name: On Evade
Description: Executes actions when creature evades from combat

Name: On being hit by Spell
Description: Event fires when creature is hit by spell and is off cooldown
Param1Tooltip: SpellId from spell_template
Param2Tooltip: Spell School (enum SpellSchools) which triggers this event - alternative to setting SpellId - defaults to -1 when SpellId is set
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Main target within range
Description: Event fires when main target is in range and event is off cooldown - not to be used for combat spell scripting
Param1Tooltip: This Distance is the Minimum Distance between the NPC and its target to allow this Event to Expire
Param2Tooltip: This Distance is the Maximum Distance between the NPC and its target to allow this Event to Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Out of Combat LOS
Param1Tooltip: Only fires event on units that are not hostile if set to 1
Param2Tooltip: Maximum range from AI creature for event to go off
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param5Tooltip: If set to 1, event only goes off on player in LOS
Param6Tooltip: ConditionId from conditions table - only fires when condition is met

Name: On Spawn
Description: Event fires on spawn of creature
Param1Tooltip: 0: Always fire, 1: Event fires only in MapId==Param2 2: Event fires only in AreaId==Param2
Param2Tooltip: See Param1

Name: Target HP threshold
Description: Event fires when main target meets HP threshold
Param1Tooltip: Maximum HP% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param2Tooltip: Minimum HP% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Target casting
Description: Event fires when target is casting and event is off cooldown
Param1Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param2Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Friendly HP deficit
Description: Event fires when friendly target within radius fulfills hp deficit condition and is off cooldown
Param1Tooltip: Amount of HP that needs to be missing from friendly unit for event to fire
Param2Tooltip: Range around AI creature where friendlies are eligible
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param5Tooltip: If set to 1, deficit is handled as percentage

Name: Friendly CCed
Description: Event fires when a friendly target within radius has CC aura with given dispel type and is off cooldown
Param1Tooltip: DispelType from enum DispelType that makes CC auras eligible (example DISPEL_MAGIC)
Param2Tooltip: Range around AI creature where friendlies are eligible
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Friendly missing buff
Description: Event fires when a friendly target within radius is missing Aura from SpellId and off cooldown
Param1Tooltip: Spell Id that has auras to look for
Param2Tooltip: Range around AI creature where friendlies are eligible
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param5Tooltip: 0: Event can only fire in Combat, 1: Event can fire anytime 2: Event can fire only out of combat

Name: On Unit Summon
Description: Event fires when specified creature Id is spawned by AI creature
Param1Tooltip: Creature Id from creature_template
Param2Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param3Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Target Mana threshold
Description: Executes actions when target is within mana threshold and cooldown is off while in combat
Param1Tooltip: Maximum Mana% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param2Tooltip: Minimum Mana% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: On Reaching Home
Description: Event is fired when creature arrives at home location after evade from combat

Name: On Received Emote
Description: Event fires when creature receives emote from player
Param1Tooltip: EmoteId from EmotesText.dbc
Param2Tooltip: ConditionId from conditions table - if set, only fires when condition is met

Name: Periodic Aura Check
Description: Event fires periodically when AI creature has auras from SpellId in given amount
Param1Tooltip: Spell Id that has auras to look for
Param2Tooltip: Amount of auras needed at AI creature for event to fire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Periodic Target Aura Check
Description: Event fires periodically when main target has auras from SpellId in given amount
Param1Tooltip: Spell Id that has auras to look for
Param2Tooltip: Amount of auras needed at main target for event to fire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: On Summon Dying
Description: Event fires when specified creature Id summon by AI creature dies
Param1Tooltip: Creature Id from creature_template
Param2Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param3Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: On Summon Despawn
Description: Event fires when specified creature Id summon by AI creature despawns
Param1Tooltip: Creature Id from creature_template
Param2Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param3Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Periodic Missing Aura
Description: Event fires periodically when AI creature does not have given aura amount
Param1Tooltip: Spell Id that has auras to look for
Param2Tooltip: Amount of auras or fewer needed at AI creature for event to fire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Periodic Target Missing Aura
Description: Event fires periodically when main target does not have given aura amount
Param1Tooltip: Spell Id that has auras to look for
Param2Tooltip: Amount of auras or fewer needed at main target for event to fire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: Generic Timer
Description: Generic timer which fires periodically regardless of combat or OOC
Param1Tooltip: Minumum Time used to calculate Random Initial Expire
Param2Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Initial Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: On AI Event received
Description: Event fires when AI creature receives AI event from any source. This is the only EVENT where the target-type TARGET_T_EVENT_SENDER (10) is defined
Param1Tooltip: enum AIEventType that was received. Supported types see CreatureAI.h enum AIEventType
Param2Tooltip: If set, only events from a creature of specific entry will fire

Name: Energy threshold
Description: Event fires when energy threshold is met in combat and is off cooldown
Param1Tooltip: Maximum Energy% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param2Tooltip: Minimum Energy% That will trigger this Event to Expire
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: On Facing Target
Description: Event fires when the main target fulfills facing condition
Param1Tooltip: If 0: AI creature must be behind main target, if 1: AI creature must be in front of its main target
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: On Spell hitting Target
Description: Event fires when a spell cast by AI creature hits a target
Param1Tooltip: Spell Id from spell_template
Param2Tooltip: Spell School (enum SpellSchools) which triggers this event - alternative to setting SpellId - defaults to -1 when SpellId is set
Param3Tooltip: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire
Param4Tooltip: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

Name: On Death Prevented
Description: Event fires when death prevention set by 42 - ACTION_T_SET_DEATH_PREVENTION occurs - happens once and then needs to be reset by action to trigger again

Name: On Target not Reachable
Description: Event fires when main target is not reachable by AI creature due to no path available - note for casters it only happens when too far out of range of main spell - used mainly for teleportation of players to AI creature
